Changelog
=========

1.1 - December 3, 2010
----------------------

- Publish portal_googlecoop tool in case it's in private state right after
  product installation.
  [piv]

1.0 - November 22, 2010
-----------------------

- Made plone2.5 compatible product googlecoop into plone3 compatible python
  package Products.googlecoop.
  Copied from http://dev.plone.org/collective/browser/googlecoop/trunk
  [piv]
